Text: Just to let everyone know, you need the original game before you can use this, not sure if it the first game has to be legit or not.
dude, how am i supposed to install this game without a serial key!? -.-

hahah u ppl arent very smart. download winrar and extract the files out of the .rar file into the location u downloaded the game into. than download a mounting program like daemon tools and mount the .iso file that comes out of the rar extraction. install the program and a .exe autorun program will appear. go on a website and download the Command and Conquer Red Alert 2 NoCD crack. it ussually should be in a .zip format. download it to the folder u downloaded the game and installed it to and right click on the .zip and it should say extract all. click that and it will bring u through a wizard. than it will ask to replace the .exe file and u click yes to all. and than u can just click the .exe program and play. or you dont have to get the NoCD crack and mount it every time u wanna play
sorry mount the .cue file after rar extraction
